Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 31 points on 11-of-29 shooting and had 12 assists against the Cavaliers.
Charlotte Hornets lost 128-114 to the unbeaten Cavaliers.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball addressed his recent fine and apologized for his comments, stating he didn't mean to offend anyone.
First-year Hornets coach Charles Lee commented on Ball's behavior, emphasizing the importance of maintaining standards and expressing confidence in Ball's commitment to improve.
